Reviews.Title: WARNING SPRINT USERS ONLY!!
Reviews.Author: Gg
Reviews.Content: WARNING SPRINT USERS ONLY!! I purchased this phone for a prepaid plan but did not realize until the package arrived that there is NO SIM CARD SLOT AVAILABLE. Not wanting to pay for data I decided to get an unlocked phone rather than a free phone with a contract. The details should emphasize the product NOT being compatible with GSM

Reviews.Title: I am really loving it
Reviews.Author: Roxanne Kenny
Reviews.Content: The phone work great and it did not take that long to ship. It was easy to turn it on and it is working great

Reviews.Title: <3 this phone.
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. In my opinion it's the perfect size. I just broke my Note 2 and I just realized how big that phone was.
